title: Ep63 Unbelievable Acquittals
description: This week, the gals drop their jaws at some of the most ridiculous acquittals in history. Topics include a not-so-mysterious insulin overdose, yet another killer cop, and courtroom racism. Pop open a bottle of Winc's Matchlock Cabernet, consult an attorney, demand a toxicology report, and tune in for Unbelievable Acquittals.   This episode is supported by TalkSpace. Get $30 off your first month with promo code "GALS" www.talkspace.com/gals
